languages.text: "Ну так вооружитесь серьезнее. Горелка и впрямь неважное оружие".
"Then arm yourselves properly. A torch seems like a poor weapon indeed."
languages.original_text: "Ну так вооружитесь серьезнее. Горелка и впрямь неважное оружие".

traits.locale_text: "Then arm yourselves properly. A torch seems like a poor weapon indeed."
"Then arm yourselves properly. A torch seems like a poor weapon indeed."
"Then arm yourselves properly. A torch seems like a poor weapon indeed."
"Then arm yourselves properly. A torch seems like a poor weapon indeed."
"Then arm yourselves properly. A torch seems like a poor weapon indeed."
"Then arm yourselves properly. A torch seems like a poor weapon indeed."

languages.text: « Alors, armez-vous comme il se doit. Les torches ne sont pas très utiles au combat. »
languages.original_text: "Then arm yourselves properly. A torch seems like a poor weapon indeed."

traits.locale_text: « Alors, armez-vous comme il se doit. Les torches ne sont pas très utiles au combat. »

languages.text: «Entonces ármese como es debido. Una antorcha no es la mejor opción».
languages.original_text: "Then arm yourselves properly. A torch seems like a poor weapon indeed."

traits.locale_text: «Entonces ármese como es debido. Una antorcha no es la mejor opción».

languages.text: “既然这样，就好好武装一下吧，火把这种武器实在是太不像话了。”
languages.original_text: "Then arm yourselves properly. A torch seems like a poor weapon indeed."

traits.locale_text: “既然这样，就好好武装一下吧，火把这种武器实在是太不像话了。”

languages.text: 「ならば、きちんと武装するがいい。松明は実に貧弱な武器のようだが」
languages.original_text: "Then arm yourselves properly. A torch seems like a poor weapon indeed."

traits.locale_text: 「ならば、きちんと武装するがいい。松明は実に貧弱な武器のようだが」

languages.text: "Dann bewaffnet Euch angemessen. Eine Fackel erscheint mir als recht dürftige Waffe."
languages.original_text: "Then arm yourselves properly. A torch seems like a poor weapon indeed."

traits.locale_text: "Dann bewaffnet Euch angemessen. Eine Fackel erscheint mir als recht dürftige Waffe."

languages.text: "Öyleyse kendinize düzgün silahlar bulun. Meşale gerçekten de zayıf kalır."
languages.original_text: "Then arm yourselves properly. A torch seems like a poor weapon indeed."
